Demo of the jekyll-timeago gem. This is not in the GitHub Pages supported list but used here through GH Actions.

  • Original value
    • 2016-03-23T10:20:00Z
  • Time ago filter
    • 6 years and 4 months ago
  • Time ago filter with YYYY-MM-DD format set using '2020-1-1'
    • 3 years and 9 months ago
